CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​CLI.​Application
public static
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​CLI.​Application

The main application class for the command line interface to Natural Docs.

Constants
StatusInterval
public const int StatusInterval

The amount of time in milliseconds that must go by before a status update.

DelayedMessageThreshold
public const int DelayedMessageThreshold

The amount of time in milliseconds that certain operations must take before they warrant a status update.

Engine.Path csvPath
)
Multithread
static private void Multithread (
string threadName,
CancellableTask task
)

Executes the task across multiple threads.  The function passed must be suitably thread safe.  This function will not return until the task is complete.

Parameters
threadName
string

What the execution threads should be named.  "Thread #" will be appended so "Builder" will lead to names like "Builder Thread 3".  This is important to specify because thread names are reported in exceptions and crash reports.

task
CancellableTask

The task to execute.  This must be thread safe.
